name: Platform Game V0.2
description:
This is second prototype of my platform game. I developed and added some mechanics and platforms,  worked on graphics a bit.

Also I added one more character(Drone) that can detect and see hidden platforms, lasers and other obstacles. 

You can switch between those characters using Tab key. Movement for drone is same, press space to rise, press control to drop. 

WASD - Movement                                                                              

Left shift - Sprint

Ctrl - Crouch

Space - Jump

E - Hookshot and cancel hookshot

R - Reload scene

T- Bring Drone back to character (It will follow character)

Tab - Switch Character
